text.Nicholson School of Communication and Me: Nicholson School of Communication and Media

li.Not open to Ad-PR, Communication & Confl: Not open to Ad-PR, Communication & Conflict, Human Communication, Journalism, or Radio-TV majors.

courseSection0.text: Not open to Ad-PR, Communication & Conflict, Human Communication, Journalism, or Radio-TV majors.

li.A minimum average GPA of 2.0 is required: A minimum average GPA of 2.0 is required in courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 15 hours used in the minor must: At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Nicholson School of Communication and Media.
li.Students must satisfy course prerequisit: Students must satisfy course prerequisites before enrolling.

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
A minimum average GPA of 2.0 is required in courses used to satisfy the minor.
At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Nicholson School of Communication and Media.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy course prerequisites before enrolling.

courseSection1.text0:
Complete at least 3 of the following: 
COM3402 - Communication Theory (3)
COM3406 - Role of Motivation in Communication (3)
COM4013 - Communication and the Family (3)
COM4014 - Gender Issues in Communication (3)
COM4022 - Principles of Health Communication (3)
COM4026 - Current Issues in Communication (3)
COM4110 - Business and Professional Communication (3)
COM4332 - Communication, Technology, and Change (3)
COM4416 - Terrorism and Communication (3)
COM4461 - Intercultural Communication (3)
COM4462 - Conflict Management (3)
SPC3445 - Leadership Through Oral Communication (3)
SPC3602 - Advanced Public Speaking (3)
SPC4302 - Advanced Interpersonal Communication (3)
SPC4426 - Group Dynamics (3)
SPC4331 - Nonverbal Communication (3)
SPC4513C - Argumentation and Debate (3)
SPC4540 - Persuasion and Communication (3)
courseSection1.text1:
Independent study or Special topics course if approved by the coordinator prior to enrolling in the class Credit Hours: 3

Additional restricted electives can be taken as approved by an advisor.

li.Internship, co-op, or independent study: Internship, co-op, or independent study credit can be used toward this minor with prior approval.

courseSection1.text:
Other Requirements

Internship, co-op, or independent study credit can be used toward this minor with prior approval.
